required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on April 10, 2017
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Body Composition of Infants: Follow-up to Placenta and Cord Blood Analyses
clinical_study.official_title: Body Composition of Infants: Follow-up to Placenta and Cord Blood Analyses

brief_summary.textblock: Investigators will characterize the body composition and metabolism of infants born from lean, overweight or obese mothers from whom they had previously obtained a placenta and/or cord blood as part of the earlier placenta and cord blood study (#111576)

clinical_study.why_stopped: determined not enough participants would be able to be enrolled and not enough data collected for good analyses

biospec_descr.textblock: Blood, urine, and a cheek swab may be collected from study participants

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- mother's prior participation in study #111576 with successful collection of placenta
- infant age 12 months (+/- 9 months)
Exclusion Criteria:
- mother did not participate in study #111576
- mother did participate in study #111576, but collection of placenta was not successful
- infant not age 12 months (+/- 9 months)
